{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:36.519

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:47.039
    | text      = In researching the source of this quotation, the Thomas Jefferson Encyclopedia reports
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:51.000
    | text      = that the first known appearance of this in print was in 1914, in an indictment of socialism
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:56.759
    | text      = delivered by John Basil Barnhill, a prominent anti-socialist debater of the time.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:02.039

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:14.279

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = an existing expression.

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
